blogs.title: Rajasthan
blogs.description: Known for its grand forts, palaces, and desert landscapes, Rajasthan offers a glimpse into India's royal heritage.

blogs.title: Maharashtra
blogs.description: A state of vibrant cities and historic caves, Maharashtra is home to Mumbai, the Gateway of India, and the Ajanta and Ellora caves.

blogs.title: Kerala
blogs.description: Famed for its serene backwaters, lush greenery, and cultural richness, Kerala is known as 'God's Own Country.'
